document.title: Immigration Policy and the Plight of Unskilled Workers
document.abstract: Public testimony by Prof. Briggs given before the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims of the Committee on the Judiciary, House of Representatives, March 11, 1999.

field.name: comments
field.value:
Suggested Citation:
Briggs, V. (2000). Immigration Policy and the Plight of Unskilled Workers. In Impact of Immigration on Recent Immigrants and Black and Hispanic Citizens: Hearing Before the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims of the Committee on the Judiciary, House of Representatives, pp. 71-75, (see also pp. 69-71 for oral comments). Washington, DC: U.S. Government Printing Office.
http://digitalcommons.ilr.cornell.edu/briggstestimonies/19

file.description: Impact of Immigration on Recent Immigrants and Black and Hispanic Citizens
